con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Seating.Request">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:TrainSeatAssignment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:TrainSeatAssignmentRequest>\r <rad:SecurityGUID>?</rad:SecurityGUID>\r <rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad:CarrierCode>\r <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>?</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:ClientIPAddress>?</rad:ClientIPAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:HistoricUserName>?</rad:HistoricUserName>\r <rad1:ActionType>?</rad1:ActionType>\r <rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad:SeriesNumber>?</rad:SeriesNumber>\r <rad:ConfirmationNumber>?</rad:ConfirmationNumber>\r </rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad1:TrainSeatAssignmentDetails>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad1:TrainSeatAssignmentDetail>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:LogicalFlightID>?</rad1:LogicalFlightID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:PersonOrgID>?</rad1:PersonOrgID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:PhysicalFlightID>?</rad1:PhysicalFlightID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:RailCarID>?</rad1:RailCarID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:RecordNumber>?</rad1:RecordNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:RowNumber>?</rad1:RowNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad1:Seat>?</rad1:Seat>\r </rad1:TrainSeatAssignmentDetail>\r </rad1:TrainSeatAssignmentDetails>\r </tem:TrainSeatAssignmentRequest>\r </tem:TrainSeatAssignment>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
